net.sf.jclal.evaluation.measure

Class AbstractEvaluation

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.evaluation.measure.AbstractEvaluation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEvaluation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiLabelEvaluation, SingleLabelEvaluation

    public class AbstractEvaluation
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEvaluation
    Abstract class for the evaluation measures.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo

      • loadMetrics

        public void loadMetrics(java.lang.String stringEvaluation)
        To extract from a text the evaluation measurements. In the first line the iteration is defined. In the second line the number of labeled instances is specified. In the third line the number of not labeled instances. Next the evaluation measures appears.
        Specified by:
        loadMetrics in interface IEvaluation
        Parameters:
        stringEvaluation - The evaluation in string format
